Love Spotify! We have the family subscription which was a much cheaper option rather than 5 individual accounts. Having different tastes in music we are able to share our playlists and discover new artists, genres etc. I'm also a big fan of podcasts and Spotify has a great selection. This app is easy to use, never crashes and absolutely worth every cent!

I love my Spotify! It's the best music app out there. Support is easily reached via chat and they're constantly adding more music. I'm not a fan of the update(as of July 2020) though. I have gotten used to this update and it works just fine. But I would really, really, really appreciate it if someone at Spotify can respond to me as to why "Friend Activity" isn't available on Chromebook. Can you also have blocking? I don't want random people following my tunes as I listen. Will it ever be?

As a long time Spotify member using premium I had hoped for a hi Res platform to up the ante so to speak , it hasn't arrived which is a little disappointing but never mind . Still very happy with it and by far the most stable easy to use app by far . Intuitive , fast and has all the music which I listen too . No glitches to really to complain about and far better than tidal and qobuz by a mile!!!! Let's hope hires comes sooner rather than later

Great App, extensive catalogue, never fails to find what Im looking for. I wish, though as a Premium (family package) holder, it would allow me to download as many tracks, albums etc that I'd like instead of being limited. Well worth the cost, works brilliantly on both my tablet and phone. If Spotify could take on Audible with regards to audio books this app will be just everything.

I fell in love with this app after the first few times I used it..so much so that I started paying for the full version..please spotify keep up the good work!! Just wish there was a cheaper paid version with maybe half the ads as opposed to no ads. Some are ok but sometimes there are just too many but I cant afford an additional bill rn..even if it IS only 10 bucks..sorry but not

Omg I love this app!! I loved the free version and being able to make my own playlists with artists that I only saw on YouTube, its cool also that I can listen to music with my phone off, many apps dont do that, Loved it soo much I bought the premium version! Now I have the option to "download" my music (It just make a symbol under the title of the song) then I can listen to music offline!

Premium is great (only on Mobile). If you're only using Spotify on your PC, you basically get a free version of premium (the only difference is that you still get ads, but you still get every single other feature), but if you mainly use your phone it's pretty worthwhile if you're an avid music listener (IMO). Pretty great app and is better than Apple Music by far because my favorite feature of this app is that you can browse recommended songs and expand your playlists. Highly recommend :)

Few years ago I gave out only 3 stars. That was due to the app crashing at least once a day. I've noticed since then many possitive improvements as well as being able to find pretty much every song I want to listen to. I honestly can't think of a title that I couldn't find. And the price for premium account is reasonable too. Great job Spotify!

Overall the app is great. It offers music for free you guys, don't complain about the ads when you can just pay for premium. And the ads are better on here than on YouTube. My only problem is the fact that the app can be terrible slow at times, can be busy loading a page for a good minute or so. It can't be my wifi as that has no impact (I have premium). I like the fact that there is a widespread community on here, and most official songs are findable. Great app.

I'll never download music again. You have the world of music at your fingertips for a reasonable price. That being said when I point out music to technical support that has explicit lyrics that are not marked accordingly I get a 45-minute chat run around with no resolution. Extremely bad service in that regard. All they have to do is play the piece that I pointed out to them and they would see within a minute.

I love being able to find and listen to whatever music fits my mood, any time, any where. I love the fact that through playlists that Spotify creates based on what I listen to, I've discovered new favorite musicians that I would have otherwise never heard. I love the fact that Spotify provides a venue new musicians to gather fans. Sadly, I also find myself feeling guilty for supporting a system that pays a pittance to the artists on whom their business depends. Buy CDs of the music you love.

I'm loving it, it's my favourite app to play music. I would recommend buying premium because it unlocks so much that makes the app even more enjoyable, such as download the songs you want, pick whichever song you want and use your mobile to change songs on an other device and the other way around. One other major plus point is that there are a lots of different subscriptions so you can find what works best for you. These is the reasons I love it and would recommend this app to anyone

Originally didn't like the app as it was limited in the simplest things. However the improvements lately have made life much easier. Resume and pause on podcast or longer, 15s skip. Able to save favorite songs and playlist creation is much easier. Repeating a song is great. Play history is amazing.. Still needs work - can't download individual songs for offline (premium) - can't bookmark podcasts or longer things incase we want to relisten to one part - they should really sell ebooks on this

Still my favorite music app. It's easy to create multiple playlists and I like discovering other playlists and being able to follow playlists and artists.. I've been introduced to artists that I really enjoy through Spotify suggestions. I like being able to download the songs so that I can listen offline. There are podcasts as well. I can't think of anything I don't like about Spotify and the app.

Haven't found a better app that I can use for music. A little slow sometimes on loading up and have to close it out. But it works fine for me 99% of the time. I have Spotify premium and being able to download songs to my phone so signal and data usage are never a problem. Highly recommend this app to everybody I talk to. ***Update*** Still use this app as my primary music app, still only has minor issues once in awhile.

I've been using Spotify now for 4 years. The app is just great. People keep complaining that premium is too expensive, but that's just nonesense. It's only 9,99¬£ a month and that's literally nothing. Other than that the app is just fantastic. Even though I'm a premium member, it wouldn't bother me that much if I had to listening to adds. As I already said, I just love this app and it's a way better than iTunes and the other bullcrap. Keep it up.

Love the fact that I can create amazing playlists that are a true reflection of me. However, the shuffle option is horrible. I have 4450 songs on my Playlist, and I only hear about 75 songs continuously. The virtual DJ is a travesty and shouldn't be an option at all. Other than that, I'm satisfied. I've had Spotify for over 13 years and that's not going to change.

One of my favorite and most used apps at any given time on my phone (and worth getting Premium if you have the money and like music a bunch). The playlist capability is dope; I love the Discover and Release Radar playlists that Spotify creates each week (I've found a lot of my current favorite artists through that). Also the end of year stats on what music I listened to the most is great. Favorite app for sure!

2 years later and I still give 5 stars! Easy to use, to link to speakers, to set as.alarm sound and sleep assistant. I love that I can learn a language through podcasts available on spotify and I can save my playlists. I'm so happy that one missed payment doesn't cause all my playlists to be deleted its saved in there for when I can pick up payments. Finally during those same "bad times" I can still enjoy spotify for free.

Great selection of music to pick from. One of the most decent music apps I've had. Every update makes it better and easier to use. Keep up the good work, Spotify! The only bad thing I have to give is the premium. I really would just like to listen to certain songs without paying for it, so it'd make the app a lot nicer if it didn't require payment to listen to a certain song! Thanks!

The best music streaming app I have used. Love that finally there are lyrics. I'm not sure if I listen music too much, but it's hard to find something new/unknown, usually music is based only around music I listen (sometimes I want something totally different). There is Discover weekly, but it needs to be improved.

I am an interior painter & I work alone and I can't imagine not having Spotify! From the minute my feet hit the floor in the morning until I go to bed I have music on. Definitely worth the monthly fee for the unlimited commercial free access & option to download for offline use. Easy and user friendly so anyone can enjoy young and old! I will, do & have recommend this app to everyone. Thanks you!!

I love it! Enables to listen to music in the go and at home with seamless transition. However, some of the songs from my local files just wouldn't play and some of the songs can't be synced to my phone. I'd give it a 7/10 now. If you can solve the local sync problem and maybe add an equaliser function I'd totaly give it a 10/10

I love Spotify & so will you. This is a most wonderful app for any time of the day or night. I pick out the songs I like, create different play lists for each genre or however I like to name them & BAM...it's all here. I also love the radio songs & how I can place them in my playlists. I would though really appreciate that SPOTIFY places the entire lyrics for each song with the song seperately so I can learn the words to my faves. Thx Spotify. You're doing a great job. 5 STAR APP.

I use music to enhance or manipulate my mood, and with this enormous, searchable library of all styles in my pocket I can find just the right sound for the moment. I like to explore music and Spotify helps me do exactly that. The hosted playlists and personal, automatically generated playlists have turned up lots of gems for me. Big name podcasts too. What's not to like? Okay, the rather primitive search function, the dross, some poor sound quality albums...but still enough good stuff for 5*s

This is a wonderful music app, with excellent features to get you to the music you love. But also get exposure to other genres and artists, such an amazing app. My brother added me to the family plan, and then we created an awesome playlist that we keep adding to. Freaking awesome!
best music app only if you have premium access though

I decided to try the app because of a seven day free trial + 3 months for 99 cents. I fell in love during the 7 day trial, but when it ended they only offered me a 30 day trial; Not the 99 cents for three months, " engagement ring" I expected . I cried, I'd been used. I was so disappointed, even crushed...:-( ...pandora won't be the same.,) we're trying to make it work will update later in December There aren't enough stars to rate this app ‚ÄºÔ∏è BEST APP. 200+hour Play List & Counting THE BEST.
best If i compare with others audio streaming App.
I like this app especially when you need to relax or need something to listen to

I've been using Spotify for about two years now. I used the free version, with ads, for a few months before paying for the ad-free version. It features obscure and popular artists in the pre-made playlists and gives great recommendations based on your listening history. The variety of podcasts that are now featured is great too!

This is one of the BEST music apps I have ever used. When ever I'm down I can always count on Spotify to have the perfect playlist to cheer me up. I 100 percent recommend this app is you are look into music.

Had a status bar bug on my s10+ but that has been fixed now, thankfully. I also love how Spotify doesn't discriminate against against payment methods, unlike some other streaming services that will only accept my domiciliary bank card which is expensive to maintain.

content: i enjoy how I have access to my hits whenever I want to drift off into my music. music is life and so is this app.

Love it, if one thing i would wish u can add concerts to your calendar. The Playlists have improved alot, espec. the daylist is great fun to listen to and i recognised my fav. genres and mixes them up. üôÇ

4-year later update: Spotify is still Spot-on, as far as music streaming apps go. Could it be better? I don't know. 100% free would be nice [ Premium incentives at no cost ], but I don't expect that. 2017 Review -> Premium is fantastic, but free is good, too. Great sound. Almost limitless pool of songs to choose from. Even has Zepp!! Cool, man !!

Good catalogue, has tons of playlists for every mood or occasion, easy to use interface, overall really good. It's quite cheap, too, but only 4 stars because you can only save a limited amount of songs (3,333.) 2019 edit: They finally increased the amount of songs you can save, so I'm giving it 5 stars. Good job!

5 outta freaking five. icl so i just wanna say that this app IS JUST SO MAJESTIC. BETTER THAN LISTENING TO MUSIC ON YOUTUBE. annoyed by ads? well, you can try going bacl to the start to avoid ads, and maybe pressing another song before it fully finishes! love this üôèüôèüôè
I have been using Spotify since it released i believe it is one of the best music apps known to mankind
Flawless service with a huge selection of music!

Spotify, not only has lots of new and old music, but, it's the ability to have more control over your playlist. I.e. Pandora offers a premium package that says you get certain perks for paying. But in reality, you don't get a difference between the 2 versions. When you do pay for premium you really do have access to the perks that make the paid version a better offer. Such as commercials. Pandora and SiriusXM will still have a DJ and commercials. Not Spotify. Plus friends can join on wifi too!!!

A great selection of genres, Artist, Songs, Audio Books and features! A rock Solid app that pings well with the Android environment. Yesterday I rocked out to Judas Priest while mowing with the tractor for two hours at work, way better than just wearing hearing protection!

Spotify is hands down my favorite music streaming service! The app is super user-friendly, and I love how easy it is to discover new music through personalized playlists and recommendations. The vast library of songs across all genres means there's always something for every mood. I also appreciate the high-quality sound and the ability to download music for offline listening. The free version is great, but the premium subscription offers even more perks like ad-free listening and better sound .

hey this app is amazing for listening vast types of music , but I have a problem with this app that though I have a premium account and all my songs downloaded then why I have to download the same song again and again from my Playlist

Spotify: My go-to music app! üéß The massive library, personalized playlists, and offline listening are game-changers. Seriously impressed with the seamless user experience and constant updates. Keep up the amazing work, Spotify team! üíö Highly recommend! üëç #Spotify #MusicApp

I guess you could call me a returnee, as I had Spotify on an older device..I listen to a wide variety of music, and they have alot of great choices from which to pick, but the only thing I do not like are commercials..so we'll see how it goes.

The commercials between songs really annoy me and random playing is not always nice. But hey, it's free. But if you get premium, I think it's a good deal. Fixed: I've grown from my earlier years. Spotify is just too good. Like a drug, if you ever have a little taste and it's the good stuff, you're hooked forever. You'll fix your bills to fit in Spotify. You'll stay in school longer just to apply for the student discount. Even if you don't use it, you'll want it; Spotify is legion.
been using Spotify since 2016, nearly 10 years! Don't stop being the awesome app you are!!!
I love this app so useful and you can hear lots of music

I've used apple music for prolly 5 years and just switched to Spotify I like it a lot more there's not that much of a difference from apple music other than Spotify looks cooler in the app and if im listening to music on my Xbox I can change the song from through my phone apple music I'd have to close my game out just to pick a song l

MORE PINNED PLAYLISTS PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE only 4 pinned and ... why should my liked songs even count as pinned? My liked songs should be the first thing by default to begin with. Is more begging required? I've already downloaded and subbed to Qobuz because my devices are bottlenecked, and I'm not sure I really need two music sources. Let's step it up!
great app! only thing it is lacking is the ability to create custom sleep timers

I love this app and I have been using it sense a few days after launch. I'm writing my 1st review because, this is the 5 year anniversary!!! I love all of the artists that they were able to put on and now, podcasts too! I love how they also don't make you buy a subscription to listen to songs other than, another music company that I'm not going to name. I've been here long though and love how much they evolved and it's great! How could anybody hate this? It's a perfect music app!

The Spotify app is amazing. Two reason are you can find almost everything what you like, song, podcast and other sounds. And the sound of this app without subscription is too good which is not in other apps.
this app is perfect for when I'm working and I don't have to constantly come back to change the song

I just have a problem with the size of the lyrics when sharing. it was perfect before,until recently they made it big. edited now,my spotify stopped working. reinstalled and it didn't let me login. even after update,still the same. ok. finally working
replyContent: We'd recommend restarting your device to see if that makes any difference. If that doesn't help, you can get in touch with our Customer Service by heading to support.spotify.com and searching "Contact us".

content: can find the things I require easily, has a good variety, use it all the time
Excellent music app with lot of features especially the storage option in external memory[ S.D card].

I have premium and it's great. I hate it's so time consuming to create playlists or add songs to them... Could you please do something about it?? To select several songs at once would be great..... Edit : this is my review 7 years later lol and this feature has been added to to the web/desktop player, I do most of my playlist making there. I have tried amazon music, apple music and deezer - in terms of user friendliness it still beats them. As a service it comes on top of these 4

I love this app so much, I will listen to hours of music on it! However, there are a lot of ads, it will tell you that you are going to get 30 minutes of uninterrupted listening and then I play a 3 minute song and have a bunch of ads after it. Overall it is really nice though! You can blend playlists with friends and each year around Christmas get a special Spotify Wrapped that shows your top songs and artists for the year that I am always so excited to get! Overall it's a really great app!

I love this app, in general, for all of it's features, data saving-very high, excellent music variety and genres, and the background running and background running while device is turned off feature. I also like how they play a requested song when you select it, immediately, or following right after the first suggested one. I only wish that they would allow for a "Remove this suggestion‚Äù feature. Thank You.
love it. Please add all the songs though. otherwise love the platform

Spotify is hands down the best music streaming platform I've ever used. The user interface is super smooth, intuitive, and constantly improving. I love how easy it is to discover new artists through personalized playlists like Discover Weekly and Release Radar. The sound quality is top-notch, and the offline mode is a lifesaver when I‚Äôm on the go. What really stands out is the massive music librar

Without premium you can't do anything but with premium you get a pretty good deal. Ads every 30 minutes is annyoing if you dont have premium. But I also won't use any other service for music. It's always up to date and always getting the newest songs and albums first. And has alot of those smaller bands that you cant find anywhere else but on YouTube (but YouTube uses up a lot more data) and every song is high quality sounding.
I've always loved this app. it's great for finding new music and organizing what you have. I've always thought the premium has been worth it and I hope they never change the plan structure! (:
So farthe free trial has been great. you can listen to what you want, make playlists, and it's easy to explore music. Edit: 05/2025 Highly recommended. my favorite music app

from the first boom box that ate through 2-3 sets of 8 D-cell batteries , past several " WAIT .it only needs 2 AA's?!?!" Walkman iterations but not the Diskman ( that really did suck ), into the future with MP3/4 to what could possibly be my favorite #Music_Player of the 50+ years I have carried music with me ! the problem i was having was fixed now I can do what I was wanting and do love the wide variety of music and I dont think I've ever encountered a song or artist that wasn't on here. I love the commercial-free Playlist with my subscription

I don't know what I would do without Spotify.. Spotify helps me focus at work, relax before bed, spice up parties and even solo karaoke for some entertainment üòÖ l don't recommend the free version though, I hate the adds. I never thought I'd sign up for the paid version, but they gave me a free 3 month trial, and I was hooked! No going back for me, it's also very reasonable costs considering how much I use Spotify throughout my day. 100% worth the monthly fee. Just sayin'

Works good, great music selection.

To those that are complaining about ads, DON'T BE A CHEAPSKATE & PAY FOR THE FREAKING APP!!! It's not expensive! I have had this app for over 8 years and have never had a problem with it! It's very affordable and has all of the bands I love. I can access new music on the day it is released and I never have any issue with downloading playlists!
I love this app. it learns you well and Segways into great songs. I do wish there was a feature to never hear certain songs. some music brings up traumatic memories and avoiding thos would be great
ultimate app, this is one of the best music app, after using long time wynk, gaana, and saavn, this is the one of best app.
it's the best way to license too music on any device
This app is awesome! I recommend getting the premium account! It opens up so many different songs, podcasts, and audio books with no ads!

Spotify is the best music app I have found. I pay for premium so I can download my playlists to use when I don't have WiFi. A recent update allows me to search for a song within my playlists which is awesome. I also enjoy that this app recommends music based on my interests. It has a section that is made just for me and includes music to discover, my top songs, a time capsule, daily mixes, rewind playlists, and release radar. Worth every penny for a premium subscription!

Great app. Works perfectly fine, just as it should. Only thing I see as problematic: if I run out of storage on my SD-card (standart storage for Spotify) it changes to internal storage automatically and does not inform on this action. It then downloads everything there until there is no space left on internal storage and my phone will have problems booting...
replyContent: Hi Jonathan! We're sorry to hear that. Just to check, is everything okay on your end now? If not, then we'd recommend reaching out to our Customer Service so they can help with this. To get in touch with them, search ‚ÄúContact Us‚Äù at support.spotify.com.

content: Great! Stay updated with both old and new songs.
